PLEASE, Can you people keep the sensless fighting to private 
emails, or over a chatline or something. I don't like opening up my 
email program just to have 50% of my emails just useless "hate" 
mail. Nobody is having fun here, the few are ruining it for the many.

> (Code, you're an idiot!  It had everything to do with me.  He made a comment
